Posts.Content: lindap wrote: Within the past nine months or so, I have been called twice for additional mammograms/ultrasounds.  The report I received from the radiologists indicated "probably benign (not cancer)."  I am concerned about the word "probably."  About 15 years ago, I had a biopsy that indicated that I had atypical hyperplasia and interductal something-or-other and microcalcifications.  Should I ask for a biopsy or wait another six months for a re-check?  Any advice would be greatly appreciated.  Thank you.  Love & Light. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Repeat Mammograms/Ultrasounds lindap sandies2
